title: Personnal toolbar disappears even menu "Display/toolbar/personal toolbar/always display
content: Monthes and monthes a already asked the question : my personal tool bar disappears everyday. Firefox is in a very good progressing and I don't understand why this bug had not been fixed. Seleral times a day, I am obliged to refresh my toolbar profile asking withe the menu : In french : "Affichage (display) -> barres d'outils (toolbars) -> Barre personnelle (Personal bar) -> Toujours afficher (allways display". Why??? What can I do? It is boring. So, access my page qith bookmarks, or display my personnal toolbar again. Il lasts few hours and then disappear again. I've not identify some algorithm or circumstancies leading to that. Someone couls give me an answer or fix it? Thanks
creator: dominique.platon

title: firefox not support font-family in select/option
content: I'm developer and now I have a problem with select/option font-family. for example my font is Arial but when I select on select field, the options shows with another default font I have not this problem with another browsers. have you any solutions to solve this problem?

title: Not able to access my firefox account
content:
I am not able to login with my firefox account. I forgot my Two-Step Authentication recovery codes and authenticator codes but i know my login password. how can i login with my account or reset Two-Step Authentication?

- i lost my recovery codes - i lost authenticator app - my firefox account is not logged in any device
creator: deeppatel234

title: Audio stops playing
content:
Basically what happens is that for example if i play a video on youtube the video plays for a while and then it shows a loading icon and firefox lags a bit. The video just continues playing after that but without any audio. I tried this in chrome and edge and they work perfectly fine. I tried this out in troubleshoot mode but it still happens. The videos only start having audio again if I restart firefox and then the issue happens again. All my drivers are up to date and I also toggled webrender but that didnt make any difference.

How do I solve this
creator: jeetdps2006

title: How do I make it so that unpinned tabs do not have the scroll function and instead squish.
content:
I just switched from Vivaldi, which is Chromium based, and I really do not like the weird arrows to go through unpinned tabs. I have so many pinned tabs that I cannot even see what the tabs are that are unpinned. If I have to keep that, I will, but I would prefer for it to squish like most.

title: Specific site is redirected to the page with the message "Something has gone wrong".
content: My Firefox tab of "https://www.codecademy.com" doesn't open and it shows the page of attached image. Every other sites opens correctly. This symptom has been appeared since yesterday and nothing was wrong before. I tried Safe Mode of Firefox , to no avail. Other browsers like Edge and Chrome open it correctly. Even a newly downloaded Firefox with addons fully synced works with no problem. Please help me to find the cause and to fix this.
